name: stripe-sms-notifications
description: This app will handle incoming requests from Stripe and send outgoing SMS messages.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio account sid. DO NOT SHARE. Find at https://www.twilio.com/console

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio auth token. DO NOT SHARE. Find at https://www.twilio.com/console

NUMBERS.description: to which numbers you want to send and call in this format seprated by space +91123 211 4454
